title: EYL #184 Lenny S on Jay-Z, Marketing, The Music Business & Roc Nation
itunes:title: EYL #184 Lenny S on Jay-Z, Marketing, The Music Business & Roc Nation
description:
For episode 184, we sat down with the living legend and the man behind the men, Lenny S. He spoke about starting with Roc-A-Fella at the beginning of the label, what he saw in Jay-Z early on, marketing, the art of cultivating relationships, and more. This is a must-watch for any fan of the culture. #lennys #jayz #hiphop 

EYL University: https://www.eyluniversity.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
